text: Bruce José Djité (born 25 March 1987) is a retired American-born Australian soccer player. He last played in Indonesia for PSM Makassar. He also played for the Australian national team as a striker. Djite was born in Washington, D.C., United States. His father is from the Ivory Coast and his mother is from Togo. He moved to Sydney, New South Wales when he was three years old. Djite speaks French and English. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Australian men's soccer players Category:Soccer players from Sydney Category:Sportspeople from Washington, D.C.
title: Bruce Djite
